channel.title: reviews on FEOTA
channel.description: Recent content in reviews on FEOTA

item.title: Review1
item.description: “Ms Shirajum is an excellent math tutor. She explains all the concepts constructively and breaks them down for better understanding. She is also willing to go over the concepts multiple times if I am having trouble understanding the problems at first. I definitely recommend her as a math tutor for everyone." -Ankita C., IB maths, International School of Helsinki

item.title: Review2
item.description: “As a tutor you are excellent and co-operative and sincere. I give you 100 out of 100. Best wishes for you." -Afzal A., IELTS student, Dhaka

item.title: Review3
item.description: “I received my maths exam results and I got the extra point, so I will now graduate! so thank you so much for all your help." -Ella T., IB maths, Helsinki
